        Initialises an arrow
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the center of the arrow (tiles)
        y - the y position of the center of the arrow (tiles)
        dx - the velocity in the x direction (tiles)
        dy - thZie de bijlage + cijfers. Wil je die svp toevoegen?e velocity in the y direction (tiles)
